title: Trump eases commercial spaceflight regulations in win for SpaceX, Musk
shortDescription: SpaceX and Elon Musk just notched a significant win with President Donald Trump's latest executive order regarding commercial rocket launches.

title: Alaska prepares for Trump-Putin summit
shortDescription: Alaskan locals brace for Trump-Putin summit as hopes and doubts rise over Ukraine peace talks.

title: DC protests Trump’s crime crackdown
shortDescription: Protesters in Washington, D.C., push back against President Donald Trump’s crime crackdown and troop deployment.

title: Zelenskyy visits London as Ukraine braces for Trump-Putin meeting
shortDescription: Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited London on Thursday to shore up European support for efforts to prevent any agreement that would carve up Ukrainian land.

title: Failed GOP candidate jailed over gun attacks on Democrats' homes
shortDescription: A failed Republican candidate was jailed for contracting gunmen to carry out drive-by shootings on the homes of Democratic officials.

title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker signs new law upping vetting for police hires
shortDescription: Illinois State Sen. Doris Turner said the act will determine "necessary guardrails to ensure we have good officers on our streets."

title: Trump-Putin summit puts Alaska in spotlight
shortDescription: Alaska’s military power and Arctic proximity make it a critical yet exposed site for US-Russia diplomacy.

title: Homeless camps removed on Trump's Kennedy Center route
shortDescription: The number of homeless in D.C. is down from pandemic levels. The White House said those who remain in camps will be jailed if they refuse to move.

title: Ivanka Trump's life in photos from business, politics to mom of 3
shortDescription: Ivanka Trump is the daughter of President Donald Trump. She has played a key role at the White House and in the Trump family business. See her life in photos.

title: Trump plans DC park makeover amid crime crackdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pledged to beautify Washington, DC by replacing aging grass.

title: What is Trump’s approval rating by state? See best and worst ratings
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has a historically low approval rating. He has received positive ratings in 27 states. See his rating in Texas and California.

title: Trump pushes plan for DC, rejects statehood
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pushes for long-term control of DC, sparking debate over statehood and mayoral authority.

title: Trump-Putin summit spotlights Alaska's beauty, strategic importance
shortDescription: Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson is a prime midway rest stop for dignitaries on the route from Washington to eastern Asia.

title: Ivanka Trump, a jiu-jitsu blue belt, to plan White House UFC fight
shortDescription: Trump first introduced the idea of hosting the UFC fight last month while talking about special events around the country.

title: Homeless encampments near Kennedy Center cleared before Trump visit
shortDescription: Homeless campsites near the The John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts are removed on August 13, 2025 as President Donald Trump visits.

title: Trump takes aim at Washington DC's 'old, tired, exhausted' grass
shortDescription: Trump says grass across DC's parks needs replaced, vowing not only to tackle crime in the nation's capital but to make D.C. "so beautiful again."

title: Trump warns Russia of severe consequences
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened Russia with severe consequences if President Vladimir Putin refuses to end the war after their upcoming meeting.

title: DC's unique status is why Trump could control local police
shortDescription: President Donald Trump directly controls DC's police and National Guard because of the federal enclave's unique status, experts say.

title: Trump’s police power in D.C. explained
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s control of D.C.’s police is raising questions about federal power. Here's what we know now.

title: Joe Biden's daughter files for divorce after 13 years of marriage
shortDescription: Ashley Biden, daughter of President Joe Biden, has filed for divorce from husband Howard Krein after more than 13 years of marriage.

title: Republicans could re-draw these seats in Texas, Ohio, Florida
shortDescription: Republicans plan to re-draw districts in Florida, Ohio and Texas. Democrats have limited power to fight back.

title: Trump to review Smithsonian exhibits, starting with these museums
shortDescription: Donald Trump's administration is conducting a review of the Smithsonian Institution, starting with the Museum of African American History and others.

title: Trump-Putin meeting: Sprawling Army base is backdrop for Ukraine talks
shortDescription: The meeting will be the first time in four years that a U.S. president has met with Putin since the Russia-Ukraine war began.

title: Newsom trolls Trump in all-caps post promising 'DEVASTATING' changes
shortDescription: California Gov. Gavin Newsom mocked President Donald Trump with an all-caps tweet amid a heated redistricting effort in Texas.

title: Trump warns Russia of 'severe consequences,' teases Putin-Zelenskyy meet
shortDescription: Trump said there would be "very severe consequences” if Vladimir Putin does not agree to end the Ukraine war when they meet in Alaska.
